newsitem.title: USA: Travis Inds in $300,000 prvt placement.
newsitem.headline: Travis Inds in $300,000 prvt placement.

text.p: Travis Industries Inc said Tuesday it reached an informal agreement for a private placement for up to $300,000 of its common stock.
Travis intends to use the proceeds to repay debts and for working capital, a statement said.

Chief executive Steve Cayou said the private placement is necessary to improve the company's liquidity and financial condition. He added Travis would pursue its plan to complete a merger or acquisition by the end of summer.
Travis stock closed at $0.035 Tuesday, down $0.005.
